TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceProviderService extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Implements the basic functionality required of a service for providing access to a data source at the level.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object AddDataSourceInstance (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor dataSourceDescriptor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddDataSourceInstance(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor dataSourceDescriptor) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, creates and returns an instance of the given data source, and adds it to the design surface.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Object> representing an instance of the added data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You should only call the AddDataSourceInstance method on data sources that are designable for example, if the<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A> value is `true`.
This method enables the service implementer to perform custom actions when a data source is added to the design surface.

Docs.exception: The type name cannot be created or resolved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection GetDataSources() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the collection of data sources at the level.
Docs.returns: A , or if there are no data sources at the level.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup InvokeAddNewDataSource (System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window parentWindow, System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition startPosition);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup InvokeAddNewDataSource(class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window parentWindow, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.FormStartPosition startPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The initial position of a form.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Add New Data Source Wizard**.
Docs.returns: A collection of newly added data sources, or if no data sources are added.

Docs.param: The initial position of a form.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Configure Data Source** dialog box on the specified data source.
Docs.returns: if any changes were made to that data source; otherwise, .
Docs.exception: The specified data source is invalid or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyDataSourceComponentAdded(object dsc) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the service that a component representing a data source was added to the design surface.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource%2A>.
Docs.value: if the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource%2A>; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports configuring data sources using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource%2A>.
Docs.value: if the service supports configuring a data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource%2A>; otherwise, .
